description:
AJKI-01 EMBROIDERED TWILL 3 PC

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Self Twill Trouser: Self Twill Shawl: Self Twill Color: Green

Immerse yourself in the lush tones of this bottle green ensemble, a homage to ancient pashmina artistry. The shirt is heavily embroidered with intricate threadwork in maroon, rust, beige, and light green, each thread telling a story of heritage and craftsmanship. Paired with a matching shawl adorned with beautifully embroidered motifs, this look radiates timeless elegance, evoking the spirit of traditional beauty.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on self twill
Embroidered front side panel left on self twill
Embroidered front side panel right on self twill
Embroidered border for front daman on self twill
Embroidered back with border on self twill
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on self twill
Embroidered border for front & back chaak on self twill
Embroidered shawl with 4-side border on self twill
1.5 meter wide width self twill for trouser
